vars_val_t Struct Reference

#include <libciutils.h>


Data Fields

char * hostVar
char * deviceName

Detailed Description

a helper structure that stores the information about the registered variable and a corresponding name of this variable. It is intended to be used to map deviceName to hostVar which is expected by cudaMemcpyTo/FromSymbol; so we can provide a hostVar to the remote side even if the symbol is a string. It is used in __cudaRegisterVariables and later in cudaMemcpyTo/FromSymbol
